synopsis.text: Many years ago, a young boy named Xu-Xian was forced to release his pet snake, unaware that it was a young snake goddess named Bai-Niang who had fallen in love with him. As adults, Bai-Niang, now transformed into a human, embarks on a journey to find her lost love. However, a local sorcerer mistakes her for a vampire and banishes Xu-Xian to protect him. Determined to reunite with their master, Xu-Xian's pet pandas, Panda and Mimi, set out on a daring adventure, becoming leaders of an animal gang in the process. Will Bai-Niang and Xu-Xian's love overcome the obstacles placed in their path, or will they remain forever separated? Join them in this magical journey of love, adventure, and self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
